results.name: Expansion of e.g.f. exp((1 - exp(-3*x))/3).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..495
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Bell Polynomial
maple: a:=series(exp((1 - exp(-3*x))/3), x=0, 24): seq(n!*coeff(a, x, n), n=0..23); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Mar 26 2019
mathematica: nmax = 23; CoefficientList[Series[Exp[(1 - Exp[-3 x])/3], {x, 0, nmax}], x] Range[0, nmax]!
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 20 2018
